episodes.title: Aftermath: A visit from the Jehovah's Witnesses elders and my official response in a letter.
episodes.description:
Source:
https://www.spreaker.com/user/robinjacksonza/aftermath-episode-12

After the publication of my first book, Losing The Faith: Truth Under Scrutiny, I received a visit from the elders of the Jehovah's Witnesses local congregation. The subsequent letter I wrote to the elders is discussed and explained.

Check out the book on Amazon Kindle. https://tinyurl.com/y74ywa4p
Paperback available at Lulu.com http://www.lulu.com/shop/robin-jackson/losing-the-faith/paperback/product-3130438.html

#JehovahsWitnesses #Elders #Disfellowship
